General.Name: Daeho Al Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Daeho Al Co.,Ltd. produces and sells various aluminum products in South Korea. It offers aluminum coils, sheets, and circles that are used as material for various industries, such as EV, ESS, LED TV, mobile phones, refrigerators, and auto parts; manufactures railway vehicles; manufactures ventilation systems; and provides masks under the Evelyn brand. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.
